com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter.elm327

Class ELM327

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,android.util.Pair<U,ResponseListener<U>>,java.lang.Void>
      • com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter.AbstractInterpreter<java.lang.String>
        • com.lukeleber.scandroid.interpreter.elm327.ELM327
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interpreter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ELM327
extends AbstractInterpreter<java.lang.String>

    An Interpreter that utilizes the ELM327 integrated circuitry to communicate with a vehicle.

    Official documentation on the ELM327 can be found at ELM Electronics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • init

        protected void init()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Performs any initialization before entering the I/O loop. This is an ideal spot to pass any configurable options to the interpreter hardware.

      • sendRequest

        public final <V> void sendRequest(Request<V> request)
        Sends an asynchronous request over this Interpreter and invokes a default ResponseListener on the UI thread when a reply is received, the request times out, or an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        request - the Request to send over this Interpreter
